title: Instructional Design Practical Skills Enhancement: Personalized Blended Education Design for Cyclical Learning

context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can explain the functional interactions of circulatory system components with 80% accuracy through graphic materials including 12-minute personalized voiceovers

Learners can transfer circulatory system principles to real-world work scenarios with over 75% accuracy by applying personalized explanation methods presented in an animation-based learning environment
Learners can establish self-directed learning plans in blended environments, maintain over 90% attendance, and achieve course objectives
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
